alert.note: Alert for Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 8:56PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tom Green and northeastern Irion Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 855 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Arden, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Arden around 915 PM CDT. San Angelo State Park around 935 PM CDT. O.c. Fisher Reservoir and Lake Nasworthy around 940 PM CDT. San Angelo around 945 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Us-67 Near The Irion- Tom Green County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
